summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GhostTube SLS Camera paranormal investigation app. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI renders correctly with steampunk design and all interactive elements functional. Camera access denied in testing environment but app handles gracefully.
passed_tests: Steampunk UI design with brass color scheme
SPIRIT button toggles spirit box with frequency display
Screenshot and Log Detection buttons (correctly disabled when not running)
History modal opens and closes properly
EMF meter gauge with animated needle
Spirit Box dial with animated needle and frequency sweep
Steampunk design elements (rivets, gears, brand plate)
Spirit Box generates random words ('leave' detected during test)
Proper error handling for camera access denial
